name: Zombusters
description:
WHO YOU GONNA CALL?


There is something strange in the neighbourhood. There are a lot of Zombies in our city, the zombie invasion is here! We need to stop them!
Our main characters are here to save the day! They are the Zombusters and are ready to save us!

Meet our protagonists

Tracy, capable of everything, she is the leader of the group.


Charles, the mad scientist who have the method to erase this virus.


Ryan, knows what to do on every situation with explosives


Peter, seriously danger when zombies are around

It will let you sticked on your seat until the end. Its 2D graphics and isometric view make it a different specie in its genre. You will have to face a horde of Zombies that try to get you down with the help of various weapons/power ups and different moving styles.
It's an ideal game to play with a friend, it's co-op capabilities would make your experience a far way better.

Features
  • Cool Weapons and Power-Ups
  • Original Indie Soundtrack (12 Tracks)
  • 10 Different Maps
  • 10 Different enemies
  • 2 Playable Characters + 2 Unlockable
  • Awesome Pixel Art graphics
